GLICKSMAN--Albert,

Aly-dearest husband, missing you every moment since July 18th, 2005, but still sharing my life with you. Love, Fran

docs.snippet: Former Australian Prime Minister Kevin Rudd is making a late bid for the top United Nations job, after months of cross-crossing the world in low-key lobbying for government support....

docs.snippet: Former presidential candidates Ted Cruz, Chris Christie, Scott Walker and Marco Rubio — the latter by video link — are among those set to speak at the Republican National Convention in Cleveland. Military leaders, members of Congress, ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Former presidential candidates Ted Cruz, Chris Christie, Scott Walker and Marco Rubio — the latter by video link — are among those set to speak at the Republican National Convention in Cleveland. Military leaders, members of Congress, actors, faith leaders and family members of presumptive presidential nominee Donald Trump are also set to speak in what the Republican National Committee calls "an unconventional lineup" that will challenge the status quo and press for Trump's agenda.

headline.main: Former Rivals, Military Leaders, Actors to Take Stage at RNC
headline.print_headline: Former Rivals, Military Leaders, Actors to Take Stage at RNC

docs.snippet: The number of shoppers heading to British high streets and retail centres fell at the fastest pace in more than two years in June, with the weeks around the country's vote to leave the EU hit particularly hard, a survey found....
docs.lead_paragraph: The number of shoppers heading to British high streets and retail centres fell at the fastest pace in more than two years in June, with the weeks around the country's vote to leave the EU hit particularly hard, a survey found.

headline.main: Fewer Britons Visit Shops After EU Referendum-BRC
headline.print_headline: Fewer Britons Visit Shops After EU Referendum-BRC

docs.snippet: Croatia's ruling conservative HDZ party chose former diplomat Andrej Plenkovic as its new leader ahead of a snap election in September, hoping to stay in power despite a fall in support driven by graft allegations and slow economic recovery....
docs.lead_paragraph: Croatia's ruling conservative HDZ party chose former diplomat Andrej Plenkovic as its new leader ahead of a snap election in September, hoping to stay in power despite a fall in support driven by graft allegations and slow economic recovery.

headline.main: Croatia's Conservatives Pick Diplomat Plenkovic to Lead Election Campaign
headline.print_headline: Croatia's Conservatives Pick Diplomat Plenkovic to Lead Election Campaign

docs.snippet: Asking prices for British residential property slipped slightly more than usual after last month's vote to leave the European Union, though the overall impact remains hard to judge, figures from property website Rightmove showed on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Asking prices for British residential property slipped slightly more than usual after last month's vote to leave the European Union, though the overall impact remains hard to judge, figures from property website Rightmove showed on Monday.

headline.main: Asking Prices for UK Houses Slip Slightly After Brexit Vote-Rightmove
headline.print_headline: Asking Prices for UK Houses Slip Slightly After Brexit Vote-Rightmove
